ai.instructions:
This extension integrates with Craft.do document management system.

## Document Organization
- Documents are organized in folders (locations)
- Built-in locations: unsorted, trash, templates, daily_notes
- Use list-folders first to discover available locations and their document counts

## Daily Notes
- Date-based documents accessed by date (YYYY-MM-DD, 'today', 'tomorrow', 'yesterday')
- Great for journaling and daily task management

## Tasks
- Scopes: inbox (unscheduled), active (due now), upcoming (scheduled), logbook (completed/cancelled)
- Tasks can be scheduled with dates and deadlines
- Marking tasks as done/cancelled moves them to logbook

## Collections
- Structured data tables within documents
- Always use get-collection-schema before adding/updating items
- Properties must match the collection schema

## Best Practices
- Don't show entity IDs to users unless specifically requested
- Use descriptive responses mentioning document/task titles
- When creating content, confirm the action was successful with relevant details

evals.input: @craft what are my tasks for today?
@craft show me my upcoming tasks
@craft what's in my task inbox?
@craft add a task to buy milk

expected.meetsCriteria: Confirms the task was created successfully

evals.input: @craft create a task to prepare presentation for tomorrow
@craft add a task with deadline next Friday: submit expense report
@craft mark the 'Review project proposal' task as done
@craft show me my completed tasks
@craft search for documents about project roadmap
@craft list all my documents
@craft create a new document called 'Meeting Notes - December'
@craft show me documents in trash
@craft what folders do I have?
@craft create a folder called 'Projects'
@craft show me today's daily note

blocks.content: Had a productive meeting with the team

evals.input: @craft add 'Had a great lunch meeting' to today's daily note
@craft search my daily notes for meetings last week
@craft what did I do yesterday?
@craft read the content of my Project Notes document

blocks.content: Key milestones and deadlines for Q1

evals.input: @craft add a heading 'Summary' to my Meeting Notes document
@craft list all collections in my workspace
@craft show items in my Reading List collection
@craft add 'The Pragmatic Programmer' to my Reading List
@craft search for documents about xyz123abc
@craft delete the document called 'Old Draft'
@craft schedule all my inbox tasks for today

commands.name: add-to-daily-note
commands.title: Add to Daily Note
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Quickly add content to today's daily note

commands.name: daily-notes
commands.title: Daily Notes
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: View and navigate your daily notes

commands.name: recently-deleted
commands.title: Recently Deleted
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: View and permanently delete trashed documents

commands.name: today-tasks
commands.title: Today's Tasks
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: View today's tasks grouped by location

commands.name: add-task
commands.title: Create Task
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Create a new task in Craft

commands.name: create-document
commands.title: Create Document
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Create a new document in Craft

commands.name: create-task-from-selection
commands.title: Create Task from Selection
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Create a task from selected text

commands.name: create-task-from-clipboard
commands.title: Create Task from Clipboard
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Create a task from clipboard content

commands.name: create-document-from-selection
commands.title: Create Document from Selection
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Create a document from selected text

commands.name: create-document-from-clipboard
commands.title: Create Document from Clipboard
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Create a document from clipboard content

commands.name: browse-folders
commands.title: Browse Folders
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Browse, create, and manage folders and their documents

commands.name: manage-spaces
commands.title: Manage Spaces
commands.subtitle: Craft
commands.description: Add, edit, and switch between Craft spaces

tools.name: search-documents
tools.title: Search Documents
tools.description: Search content across all documents in the Craft space using relevance-based ranking. Supports filtering by location, date ranges, and folders.

tools.name: search-blocks
tools.title: Search Blocks
tools.description: Search content within a specific document or page block. Supports plain text and regex patterns. Returns matching blocks with before/after context.

tools.name: search-daily-notes
tools.title: Search Daily Notes
tools.description: Search content across multiple daily notes using relevance-based ranking. Supports date range filtering.

tools.name: use-tasks
tools.title: Get Tasks
tools.description: Retrieve tasks from the Craft space. Filter by scope: active (due tasks), upcoming (scheduled), inbox, logbook (completed/cancelled), or document.

tools.name: get-blocks
tools.title: Get Blocks
tools.description: Fetch blocks from a document or daily note. Use document ID to get document content, or date to get a daily note.

tools.name: insert-blocks
tools.title: Insert Blocks
tools.description: Insert new blocks into a document or daily note. Supports text, headings, lists, tasks, and other block types.

tools.name: update-blocks
tools.title: Update Blocks
tools.description: Update existing blocks in a document. Can modify content, task state, and other properties.

tools.name: delete-blocks
tools.title: Delete Blocks
tools.description: Delete blocks from a document by their IDs.

tools.name: move-blocks
tools.title: Move Blocks
tools.description: Move blocks to a new position within the same document or to a different document/daily note.

tools.name: list-documents
tools.title: List Documents
tools.description: List documents in the Craft space. Filter by location, folder, or date ranges.

tools.name: create-document
tools.title: Create Document
tools.description: Create a new document in the Craft space. Specify destination folder or location.

tools.name: delete-documents
tools.title: Delete Documents
tools.description: Delete documents by moving them to trash. Documents already in trash are permanently deleted.

tools.name: move-documents
tools.title: Move Documents
tools.description: Move documents between locations or folders. Can restore documents from trash.

tools.name: list-folders
tools.title: List Folders
tools.description: List all folders in the Craft space with document counts and hierarchical structure.

tools.name: create-folders
tools.title: Create Folders
tools.description: Create new folders at root level or nested inside existing folders.

tools.name: delete-folders
tools.title: Delete Folders
tools.description: Delete folders. Contents are moved to parent folder or Unsorted.

tools.name: move-folders
tools.title: Move Folders
tools.description: Move folders to root level or inside other folders.

tools.name: create-task
tools.title: Create Task
tools.description: Create a new task in inbox or daily notes. Supports schedule dates and deadlines.

tools.name: update-task
tools.title: Update Task
tools.description: Update a task's state, schedule date, or deadline. Marking as done/cancelled moves to logbook.

tools.name: delete-task
tools.title: Delete Task
tools.description: Delete a task from inbox, logbook, or daily notes.

tools.name: list-collections
tools.title: List Collections
tools.description: List all collections across documents or daily notes. Filter by document or date range.

tools.name: get-collection-schema
tools.title: Get Collection Schema
tools.description: Get the schema of a collection including property definitions and types.

tools.name: get-collection-items
tools.title: Get Collection Items
tools.description: Get all items from a collection with their properties and content.

tools.name: add-collection-items
tools.title: Add Collection Items
tools.description: Add new items to a collection. Items must match the collection schema.

tools.name: update-collection-items
tools.title: Update Collection Items
tools.description: Update existing items in a collection.

tools.name: delete-collection-items
tools.title: Delete Collection Items
tools.description: Delete items from a collection including their nested content.

preferences.name: documentsApiUrl
preferences.title: Documents API URL
preferences.description: Your Craft Documents API URL. Get it from Craft Settings > API Access.

preferences.name: documentsApiKey
preferences.title: Documents API Key
preferences.description: Optional API key for Documents connection. Create one in Craft API connection settings for enhanced security.

preferences.name: dailyNotesAndTasksApiUrl
preferences.title: Daily Notes & Tasks API URL
preferences.description: Your Craft Daily Notes & Tasks API URL. Get it from Craft Settings > API Access.

preferences.name: dailyNotesAndTasksApiKey
preferences.title: Daily Notes & Tasks API Key
preferences.description: Optional API key for Daily Notes & Tasks connection. Create one in Craft API connection settings for enhanced security.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
